name: Survival: The BackRooms
description:
Survival: The BackRooms is

a thrilling card-based survival game set in the Backrooms universe. 

In this game, you must carefully manage your strength and sanity as you explore and interact with items in the environment. 

Every interaction will cost , so you'll need to weigh the risks . 

The goal is to see how many floors you can survive, but be careful—the deeper you go, the more dangerous the backrooms become. 

Can you uncover the hidden plot within the game?

Play now to find out!

CONTROL:

Drag the Observe or Operate card from the lower right corner to any highlighted areas to make things happen.
